summary: Upgrade the power from miraak items.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img839/5909/firstdragonborn.jpg[/img]


[b]Description[/b]
==================================

This mod Modify the Miraak items´s enchantment. Why did i this? Well, you suffer sooooooooooo much to do all the quests from DLC, probally 15~20 Hours gameplay, you fight with the Powerful Miraak, the legendary Dragonborn who tried to dominate all Solstheim and Skyrim and when you defeat him and take his items, you just reiceve some noobs items, worst than your Steel/Glass items, very cheap items, powerless , almost useless for every player but the Magic Resist -.-, WHERE A MIGHTY AND LEGENDARY ITEMS FROM A LEGENDARY DRAGONBORN COSTS ONLY 100 GOLD? ARE YOU FCKING KIDDING ME? So i modified every items, to give the power what a Dragonborn items deserves.

[b]Be Strong, Be True, Be the TRUE AND MIGHTY DRAGONBORN OF THE SKYRIM![/b]


[b]Installation[/b]
=================================

Just drop the file on your TESVFolder\\Data and make sure it its checked on Data Files.


[b]Suggestions[/b]
=================================

If you´re thinking too OP, give suggestions, i´ll analyze them and make the necessary modifications to balance everything.

[b]Enchantments[/b]
=================================

[b]Miraak Boots[/b] ==> Increase Mov. Speed by 45 pts, Stamina by 100 pts ,Stamina Regen by 100% ,Carry Weight by 150, and the Vanilla ABS Enchantment, Price: 25550.

[b]Miraak Robe[/b] ==> Increase Light Armor Skill by 10 pts, Health regen by 80%, Health by 50 pts, Magic Resistance by 30%, Price: 18349.

[b]Miraak Gloves[/b] ==> Increase One-Handed and Two-Handed Damage by 25%, Bows Damage by 35%, Lockpicking easiness by 20%, Armoury improvement by 30%, Health by 25 pts, Potions´s Creation Power by 30%, Pickpocketing easiness by 10%, Price: 19997

[b]Miraak Mask[/b] ==> Increase Magicka Regen by 125%, Magicka by 80 pts, Waterbreathing , Potion´s Creation power by 30%, Health by 25pts. Counjuration,Alteration,Illusion,Destruction spells are 35% less to cast. Time between shouts reduced by 30%. Price: 18860.

[b]Miraak Sword[/b] ==> Absorb 15 Stamina pts, 20 Health pts, 12 Magicka pts. Enchantment Charge = 8000, Damage = 69, Price: 10921.

[b]Miraak Staff[/b] ==> Enchantment Charge = 15000, Price: 12589.
author: BlackEffect
